Text: Ha ha - I was JUST about to make a torrent like this one :)

Haha, sometimes it's hard to catch up to a series after more than a few issues have passed and it becomes difficult to try and track em all down. Just trying to help get some people who want to catch up with this series before things take a huge turn like it looks like they are about to.

The Comic Community here always appreciates your fantastic uploads MrDowntown! Thx again.
